model.name: Tagged Version Checkout - ONCE Component Version Review
model.description: Checkout each tagged version into components/ONCE directory as dedicated version folders, remove version folders from gitignore, and commit all versions for TRON's GitHub review and selection.
model.rationale: TRON needs to review all tagged ONCE versions in GitHub to choose the correct recovery point. Each version must be checked out as dedicated folder and committed for visibility.
acceptance_criteria: Checkout each v0.3.0.0-build-* tag into components/ONCE/v{tag}/ directories
Remove any gitignore patterns that hide version folders
Commit all version directories to make them visible in GitHub
Preserve each version's complete state for review
Enable TRON to review and choose correct recovery version

technical_details.commit_strategy: Single commit with all versions for review

model.implementation_notes: This enables TRON to visually review all tagged versions in GitHub and select the correct recovery point before violations started.
